rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious and welcoming entrance area aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Modern open space designed to be the focal point of family gatherings and activities, ensuring natural light enters through large windows placed according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated with the living room for a seamless flow, positioned adjacent to the kitchen area in compliance with local design norms and Vastu. The dining area is designed to ensure a clear line of sight from the entrance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design with ample counter space and storage, ideally placed on the south-eastern side as per Vastu guidelines for prosperity and positive energy. Includes ventilation openings to meet local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, positioned in the north-west direction to align with Vastu principles for relaxation and well-being.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room designed on the east side as per Vastu recommendations, ensuring a good energy flow and privacy.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space with ample shelving for books, natural light, and serene ambiance, positioned in the north-east zone as per Vastu guidelines to enhance knowledge and creativity.

rooms.name: Utility Room/Balcony
rooms.description: Multipurpose room acting as a storage or small laundry space with direct access to the exterior for ventilation. Balcony is integrated on the south-west side per Vastu alignment.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Primary entry point designed for both aesthetics and functionality. Placed in the south to allow natural light and energy flow.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Provides access to the balcony area for ventilation and relaxation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Expanded master suite with a walk-in closet and adjoining bathroom. Positioned in the north-west for enhanced relaxation according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom designed on the east side ensuring privacy and positive energy flow per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Modern study area with integrated workspace and ample natural lighting, located in the north-east as recommended by Vastu for intellectual pursuits.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: Continuous veranda offering outdoor space, placed along the south-west to complement the building's alignment and provide a cooling effect.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Secure staircase connecting ground floor and first floor. Designed in accordance with building norms for safety and accessibility.

openings.name: Roof Access
openings.description: Provides access to the roof terrace or additional outdoor space if available, following local design guidelines.
